lead_paragraph: A professor shows that a language is forever in flux — and that many of the rules grammatical zealots wave about like cudgels are arbitrary and destined to be swept aside as English evolves.
snippet: A professor shows that a language is forever in flux — and that many of the rules grammatical zealots wave about like cudgels are arbitrary and destined to be swept aside as English evolves.

headline.main: This Is English, Rules Are Optional
headline.seo: ‘The Lexicographer’s Dilemma’: Jack Lynch Explores English
headline.print_headline: This Is English, Rules Are Optional
